features: Triangular shape that guides finger placement
Includes 5 triangle pencils for kids in fun barrel colors, 1 lead refill set, and 2 eraser refills
body.description: Learning to write is an important stage in every child’s development, but writing products sold today are not designed with kids in mind. The Paper Mate Handwriting triangular mechanical beginner pencil provides control for early writers! The #2 triangle pencil has thick 1.3 mm lead for less breakage and a triangular shape that guides finger placement. Plus, bright barrel colors make handwriting fun. The perfect addition to your school supplies for preschool and kindergarten.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Paper Mate Handwriting Triangular Mechanical Pencil Set Learning to write is an important stage in every child's development, but writing products sold today are not designed with kids in mind. The Paper Mate Handwriting triangular mechanical pencil provides control for early writers! The pencil features: Thick lead for less breakageTriangular shape that guides finger placementFun barrel colors and designs

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No-break lead, great pencil for students and adults
reviews.reviewText: These are the greatest mechanical pencils on the market! They are amazing because the lead is thicker than normal, does not break, and makes handwriting easy to see and read. I also like the triangular body shape of the pencil, It fits nicely in my hand and is very comfortable. The erasers are big and do not break apart like other pencil erasers. These pencils are also on the cheaper end of mechanical pencils, yet are definitely a quality product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Yes, meant for children- but they're my go-to!
reviews.reviewText: As an adult dealing with carpal tunnel, I stumbled upon PaperMate Handwriting Triangular Mechanical Pencils, and they've been nothing short of miraculous. Originally intended for kids learning to write, these pencils have become my everyday companions, transforming my writing experience completely.Ergonomic Bliss for Carpal Tunnel:The triangular shape of these pencils is a game-changer, especially for someone like me dealing with carpal tunnel. They are incredibly easy to hold and, when paired with a pencil gripper, provide unparalleled comfort. Writing for extended periods, whether in class or jotting down notes, is no longer a painful ordeal but a comfortable and enjoyable experience.Bold Lines, Bold Ideas:What truly sets these pencils apart for me is the 1mm lead, which creates thick, bold lines. As someone who loves writing with emphasis, these pencils allow me to express myself with confidence. The thickness of the lines adds a touch of boldness to my notes, making my handwriting not just legible but also visually striking.Durable and Long-Lasting:I've been using my most recent pack for a couple of months now, and I haven't needed to add more lead or change the eraser yet. Considering I use these pencils daily for college, their durability is impressive. The set even comes with extra erasers and lead, providing fantastic value for the price.Minor Eraser Quibble:While the eraser could be better, it's not a significant issue for me. I carry a separate eraser with me, so the minor flaw doesn't impact my experience much. Given the pencils' overall performance, this minor inconvenience is easy to overlook, especially considering the other fantastic features they offer.Conclusion:In conclusion, PaperMate Handwriting Triangular Mechanical Pencils have been a lifesaver for my hands and my handwriting. They offer unparalleled comfort, create bold and beautiful lines, and are incredibly long-lasting. As an adult navigating the challenges of carpal tunnel, I can't recommend these pencils enough. Whether you're a student, a professional, or anyone who enjoys writing with style and comfort, these pencils are a must-have. They've turned my daily writing tasks from a chore into a joy. Don't miss out on the ergonomic bliss and creative freedom these pencils offer. They are simply amazing!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These pencils are a fantastic find. The design is sleek and comfortable to hold, making writing a breeze. The 1.3mm lead is a game-changer for bold and precise lines, and it doesn't break easily. Plus, the set comes with lead and eraser refills, which means less hassle and more value for your money.Now, let's talk about those erasers. They are super effective and leave your paper looking clean and neat. No more annoying smudges or ripped pages!In a nutshell, if you want a great tool for writing or sketching, give the Paper Mate Handwriting Triangular Mechanical Pencil Set a try. It's user-friendly, budget-friendly, and a real asset for any shopper.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Mechanical Pencils
reviews.reviewText: Must buy! I’m an elementary teacher and these are by far the best mechanical pencils. Hard to break the led when using like others. Comfortable writing hold. Love the way it writes. Also refillable. Most of our staff all use. Kids are buying them too now. Love there’s.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Pencils - BUY FOR ALL YOUR TEACHERS!
reviews.reviewText: I'm a teacher and another teacher friend of mine had these. I borrowed one for 10 minutes and I was sold!!!!They write beautifully and feel like a real pencil. I love the erasers. They are super durable and I appreciate that they come with the refill as well. I dont find they are cheap/flimsy like other brand mechanical pencils. I frequently lose pencils but these have lasted 3 months in my classroom and I still have all of them!!!! I also like that these do not have an annoying clip on them (because they always break on me). I like that you just click the eraser for more of the graphite to come out.They are comfortable and write in a dark enough manner that it's easy to photocopy. 10/10 -- a must have. My only wish is that they make a pack that looks like a standard pencil instead of all the fun colors -- the fun colors are fun but I also like the classic pencil look too. I got these on sale and I hope they go on sale again so I can have some more!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love how these pencils write and how strong the lead is. I just wish that there was a bit more lead for them. Also, after you to about 1/4 way down the lead won't stay in place to write. So you are really wasting the lead.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best pencil ever
reviews.reviewText: The shape, the control, the comfort, the writing, it's all perfect. There is no other pencil. The eraser leaves a little to be desired but it's fine, just moves around while you use it a little more than is really helpful and it's not really a super clean erase, so you are gonna see a little something left over.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Pencil for any age
reviews.reviewText: I ordered these for my Young Children. I was annoyed at always having to sharpen pencils so the mechanical aspect is great. The thicker, chunky size of the pencil is also great for small hands and the lead is Much Thicker than a typical mechanical pencil allowing young writers to not break the pencil tip easily.I have ordered several packs of these over the last year or so. My kids love them and I actually really prefer using them over a regular pencil or other mechanical pencil too.Good quality & good price.
Son una buena opción para la escuela y son resistentes
Lead is thick so it doesn’t break. Thick barrel makes it easy to hold properly.

Ya había trabajado con estos portaminas y cumplen su función: tienen buen agarre y no mancha la goma. Este paquete lo compré para mis chamacos, se ven atractivos y vayan practicando con diferentes útiles. El inconveniente va a ser cuando se acaben las minas; toca conseguir la medida. Aproveché el pasado buen fin, las hallé en OfDpt Mx., vendieron las minas a precio de liquidación $14 cada juego de 12 pzs. Buena compra.
